page.title: 11Local Policewoman
page.content: W.P.C.Bennett is a policewoman who visits our area regularly.She likes to get out to meet people.She has been specially trained to help them and to prevent crime.She wears a uniform and is sometimes seen in a car or sometimes seen patrolling the estates.She works in shifts so sometimes she is seen at night and sometimes during the day.During the long holidays the police organise activities for schoolchildren. The W.P.C. not only arrests men and women who she finds breaking the law but attends road accidents and gives talks in schools on road safety.She helps to find children who are lost. There is not a lot of crime in this area as it is a rural area. She is in constant contact with the police station by personal radio.
